actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide for the reclassification of positions of deputy U.S. marshal.

summary.text: Provides for the reclassification of positions of deputy United States marshals to that of GS-5, GS-7, GS-9 and GS-11.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide for the reclassification of positions of deputy U.S. marshal.
